resources.string: \ This game is played just like regular Tic Tac Toe with one difference: to win a tile you have to win a smaller game of Tic Tac Toe inside that tile.\n\ \n\ A tie happens when there are no further moves. In the case of a tie in a small board, that will count as a win for both sides in the larger game.

\ The game consists of nine 3 by 3 boards as shown in picture 
\ In each 3*3 board, you will enjoy playing the awesome game of Boggle. 
\ The timer runs for 90 seconds. 
\ However there is a secret bonus round which can come anytime during the game play but only once during the game. During that 3 second window, a flying brick will appear which will change its position every second. 
\ Your goal is to catch the brick and press it. 
\ If you are able to do so, your timer resets to 90 seconds even if you have 1 second left before. 
\ The scoring is Simple: Words greater than 6 will be valued as 4 points per character Other words will get you 2 points per character! 
\ Just a word of caution- The world is made open to you as a challenge. You can jump from 1 box to another after submitting each small square word. 
\ But the longest word can still be of 9 characters. 
\ Good Luck!
The Log Token button logs the Registration token to the log. The Send Notification Button sends the notification to the client device.
